job.title: Circuit Design Engineer
job.description:
TET Estel
(Tallinn Electrical Engineering Factory), founded in
1870
, is a leading player in the
power converter equipment market
.
We design and manufacture
power converter systems and semiconductor devices
for industrial applications worldwide, offering complex, high-quality, turnkey technological solutions..
We are expanding our R&D department and are looking for a talented
Circuit Design Engineer
to join our team in Tallinn.
üéì Requirements
Bachelor's degree in
Electrical or Electronic Engineering
;
At least
3 years of hands-on experience
in circuit design;
Experience in
schematic and PCB documentation
development;
Proficiency in
MATLAB
and/or
Mathcad
for modeling and simulations;
Knowledge of
modern electronic components
,
layout
, and
EMC principles
;
Language skills: English, Estonian, and Russian;
Accuracy, teamwork, and a proactive, solution-oriented mindset.

üîß Key Responsibilities
Design
low- and/or high-power electronic circuits
for converter equipment;
Develop
documentation for printed circuit boards (PCBs)
;
Perform necessary
technical and electrical calculations
;
Prepare
technical specifications
and requirements for circuit applications;
Select and evaluate components
, participate in forming component purchase requests;
Provide
engineering supervision
during the manufacturing process;
Take part in
testing and commissioning
of power converter systems.

üåü We Offer
A stable position in a
technologically advanced company
with 150+ years of history;
Participation in
complex R&D projects
and real industrial applications;
Professional growth
and training opportunities;
A
supportive and experienced engineering team
;
Competitive salary
and performance-related bonuses;
A role where your
engineering ideas become real products
.
üìç
Location:
Tallinn, Estonia
üìÖ
Apply by:
17 December¬†2025
If you're passionate about circuit design and want to contribute to the future of power electronics, we'd love to hear from you!
